ide.currentUsageDefn{defnLoc: span{from: FIdx, to: TIdx}, usageLoc: UL} :-
  refGraph.Usage{definitionLoc: span{from: FIdx, to: TIdx}, usageLoc: UL} &
  ide.Cursor{idx: CIdx} &
  FIdx <= CIdx &
  CIdx <= TIdx.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "head" [label="{<head/relation> ide.currentUsageDefn|{{<head/attrs/defnLoc> defnLoc|{{<head/defnLoc/relation> span|{{<head/defnLoc/attrs/from> from|<head/defnLoc/from> FIdx}|{<head/defnLoc/attrs/to> to|<head/defnLoc/to> TIdx}}}}}|{<head/attrs/usageLoc> usageLoc|<head/usageLoc> UL}}}" shape="record"];
  "FIdx" [];
  "TIdx" [];
  "UL" [];
  "CIdx" [];
  "opt0/clause0" [label="{{{{{{{<opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/from> FIdx|<opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/attrs/from> from}|{<opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/to> TIdx|<opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/attrs/to> to}}|<opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/relation> span}}|<opt0/clause0/attrs/definitionLoc> definitionLoc}|{<opt0/clause0/usageLoc> UL|<opt0/clause0/attrs/usageLoc> usageLoc}}|<opt0/clause0/relation> refGraph.Usage}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause1" [label="{{{<opt0/clause1/idx> CIdx|<opt0/clause1/attrs/idx> idx}}|<opt0/clause1/relation> ide.Cursor}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause2" [label="{{<opt0/clause2/left> FIdx|<opt0/clause2/right> CIdx}|<opt0/clause2/binOp> \<=}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause3" [label="{{<opt0/clause3/left> CIdx|<opt0/clause3/right> TIdx}|<opt0/clause3/binOp> \<=}" shape="record"];
  "FIdx" -> "opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/from" [];
  "FIdx" -> "opt0/clause2/left" [];
  "TIdx" -> "opt0/clause0/definitionLoc/to" [];
  "TIdx" -> "opt0/clause3/right" [];
  "UL" -> "opt0/clause0/usageLoc" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause1/idx" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause2/right" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause3/left" [];
}
